attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a result of the PMs headline grabbing cut in the basic rate of tax, the starting rate of 10% was scrapped. This doubles the tax burden of those least able to afford it and penalises single people living on the lowest incomes. Sign this petition if you also believe that it is not right that a cut in tax for the well off majority is funded by those earning the least.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
